name: Colony First
description:
Can you escape the night terrors and return to the colony?

Attempt just that in this top down tower defense action strategy game! Fortify your base with thick walls! Make access points in them with gates! Build generators to power silos to earn a cash flow! And finally build a network of towers to defend your base from the ever increasing horde of enemies!

Will you last through the night and pay off your rescue debt in time to summon help? Or will you be lost to the tentacles of the brain like (and brain hungry!) alien fauna?

Play the Colony First alpha to find out!

Current Changes:

Version: 0.6.7

  • You are now shown what you are building before you build it.
  • You are charged correctly for upgrading structures.

Features:

  • Build and upgrade 5 different structures!
  • Towers change slightly as upgraded!
  • Build Silos for cash flow but these require power from Generators!
  • Build gates to allow ease of movement within and without your base!
  • Destroy three different alien creatures!
  • Gather enough money to escape!
  • Play the Arcade mode to get ready for the upcoming Story campaign!
  • Build your base however you like!
  • Currently stuck on easy mode to allow ease of finishing!
